title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 325.1 - Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 325.1 - Construction

State Regulations

These policies shall constitute rules of the board of
trustees for the government of the university and the institutions therein
regulating the matters contained herein as authorized by law. Nothing in these
policies contained shall be construed to restrict the power of the board of
trustees from time to time to alter, amend, revise or repeal the provisions
hereof in whole or in part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
325.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
